an10.178:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an10.178:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an10.178:2.2: Panatipato, adinnadanam, kamesumicchacaro, musavado, pisuna vaca, pharusa vaca, samphappalapo, abhijjha, byapado, micchaditthi—
an10.178:3.2: Panatipata veramani, adinnadana veramani, kamesumicchacara veramani, musavada veramani, pisunaya vacaya veramani, pharusaya vacaya veramani, samphappalapa veramani, anabhijjha, abyapado, sammaditthi—
